name: Weird Shit is Going to Happen
storyline: Your parents are dead, they died in a car accident and you were the driver. This happened about a year ago, and you've fully recovered from your injuries by now. Life goes on, but the company you worked for doesn't exist anymore, and you have some serious trouble finding a new workplace. To make things worse, you still have to pay the loan for the funeral of your parents and for the damage your accident caused. Money starts to grow slow when suddenly a letter from your estranged grandmother arrives.
summary: Weird Shit Is Going to Happen is an adult visual novel where weird shit is going to happen. The game is built around a lot of little side stories. As you are exploring these unusual stories, you will try to build a Harem with girls you meet in these side stories.
